import Loader from 'react-loaders' import { useRef } from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' import './index.scss' const Contact = () => { const form = useRef() const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs .sendForm( 'service_z9ylwtc', form.current, 'your-token') .then( () => { alert('Message successfully sent!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('Failed to send the message, please try again') } ) } return ( <>

Contact me

I am interested in freelance opportunities - especially on ambitious or large projects. However, if you have any other requests or questions, don't hesitate to contact me using below form either.

) } export default Contact
